name: Political Warfare Analysis
description: Understanding the use of political influence and subversion as a tool of warfare.

cards.title: Election Interference Tactics
cards.description: Analyzing state-sponsored influence campaigns on global elections.
cards.bulletpoints: Misinformation campaigns, social media manipulation, hacking voter infrastructure

cards.title: Psychological Warfare in Politics
cards.description: How political entities use psychological manipulation to control narratives.
cards.bulletpoints: Propaganda frameworks, mass perception control, media warfare
